name: Maestro Interactive, Inc.
description: Operator of a white-label platform intended to help enterprise live streamers own, engage, and monetize audiences. The company's live and on-demand video streaming platform provides interactive video channels with two-way communication for personalized experiences, enabling content creators and brand sponsors to engage and monetize audiences at a large scale.
one_liner: Operator of a white-label platform intended to help enterprise live streamers own, engage, and monetize audiences. The company's live and on-demand video streaming platform provides interactive video channels with two-way communication for personalized experiences, enabling content creators and brand sponsors to engage and monetize audiences at a large scale.
